text: Eric John Filby (1917-2004) was a male English international table tennis and lawn tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1938 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Hyman Lurie. In 1950 he moved from Norfolk to Croydon. Filby played in the 1955 Wimbledon Championships – Men's Singles. ==See also== * List of England players at the World Team Table Tennis Championships * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:English male table tennis players Category:1917 births Category:2004 deaths Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists Category:English male tennis players
title: Eric Filby
